Index >  CapNumItems

CapNumItems

Description

Returns or sets the number of values of capability.

Data type

<int>

Syntax

.CapNumItems;

Remarks

Check this property after calling CapGet().
Set this property before calling CapSet().

Valid only when the capability has the CapType of TWON_ARRAY (3) or TWON_ENUMERATION (4).

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode orErrorStringfor error information.

See also

How to Negotiate Capability with Different Capability Container Types

CapGet()
CapReset()
CapSet()
